title: What are the name of the notes and rest? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello. Here are the names of notes and rests. quarter note, half note, dotted half note, dotted quarter note, eighth note, and sixteenth notes. these are some of the most common notes. here are some of the rests. whole rest, half rest, quarter rest, eighth rest and sixtheenth rest. these are some of the most common rests that you will see on a piece of music. i hope this helps.
ABCDEFG Ab Bb Cb Db Eb Fb Gb A# B# C# D# E# F# G# 12 pitches or notes rests Whole note rest half note rest Quarter note Eighth note etc Easy to look up , very common uncontroversial knowledge
